author: jorton
msg: Note unresolved cause of current crashes in the test suite.

author: jorton
msg: * lib/Apache/TestSSLCA.pm: Bump CRL expiry to a year so that
every test checkout doesn't break every thirty days.

author: ningjiang
msg: CAMEL-2738 changed the constant Exchange.DISABLE_STREAM_CACHE to Exchange.DISABLE_HTTP_STREAM_CACHE

author: jorton
msg: * lib/Apache/TestSSLCA.pm (generate): Ensure the DNs in the server certs
match up with the server hostname being used for testing; the proxy
now (correctly) fails if they don't match.
